title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.6 - Penalties and assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.6 - Penalties and assessments

State Regulations

Whenever it appears in any case that the employer or
carrier has violated a section of the Workers' Compensation Law which provides
for the imposition of penalty or assessment, or for the accrual of additional
compensation, the chairman or the board (as may be indicated) shall take such
action thereon as is contemplated by the section violated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
